Package BDA

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Background
    Class that creates the app background image.
    ChangeMail
    Class that changes email of the BDA account.
    ChangeName
    Class that changes name of the BDA account.
    ChangePass
    Class that changes passwords of the BDA account.
    ContainsFilter
    Class that filters lists by containing certain words
    DateFilter
    Class that represents a date filter.
    Email  
    EmailSingular
    Class that updates the JFrame of the App and shows a singular email's content.
    Facebook
    Facebook App.
    FacebookPost
    Facebook Post.
    FacePost
    Face Post.
    GuiResponse
    Class that opens Email Response Form.
    Home
    Main App class.
    Login  
    Mail
    This class implements different Email functions.
    MainTimeline
    Class that represents the app's MainTimiline with access to the Email, Facebook and Twitter Timeline and to its respective contents
    SignUp
    This class updates the window frame and displays the sign up form of our BDA application.
    T
    Represents a tweet's object
    Tweet
    Represents the tweet's Frame.
    TwitterApp  
    UserFilter
